item.title: SQL: Zero to Advanced pt. 1
item.description: materials by Bosscoder Academy, found on LinkedIn Format The materials are sorted into 24 “days” of learning, each with a central theme. My goal is to break them into 3 posts, 8 “days” each, with a distillation of the already brief material in each section as a review of SQL. 1. Introduction to SQL and Relational Databases 1.1 Content SELECT - INSERT - UPDATE - DELETE - 1.2 Practice Questions Question Answer Write a SQL query to insert a new record into the "
